sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: Only Education was facing the complex task of asserting credibility and visibility in an oversaturated EdTech environment. Despite a growing user base, the brand lacked a centralised strategy to attract and retain students across disciplines. Their website did not reflect their pedagogical strengths, and the marketing funnel was fragmented, impacting both traffic and conversions.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RankKit delivered a comprehensive brand overhaul by producing high-quality ad films, educational content, and professional branding videos. The team launched a robust SEO strategy, segmented social media campaigns, LinkedIn positioning, and automated marketing workflows through email and WhatsApp. Technical enhancements to the site structure, content architecture, and GMB optimisation were also undertaken to boost discoverability.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: Post-intervention, Only Education saw a 65% uplift in organic keyword visibility and a 50% rise in qualified web traffic. Social media engagement rates improved by 90%, and advertising efficiency increased through a 25% reduction in cost-per-acquisition. The result was a unified digital presence that positioned Only Education as a trustworthy and technologically advanced academic counselling platform in India.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: NEETGyan, despite having substantial educational content, struggled to compete in the crowded NEET preparation market. The site lacked targeted SEO refinement, which hindered its ability to rank for high-volume exam queries. This led to missed opportunities in attracting organic student traffic and building authority.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RankKit implemented a precision-based SEO strategy tailored to NEET-specific searches. This included granular keyword research across Physics, Chemistry, and Biology topics, along with technical improvements such as mobile responsiveness, structured data integration, and Core Web Vitals optimisation. A focused backlink acquisition plan was also put into place through academic domains and student forums.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: As a result, NEETGyan saw a 50% surge in organic traffic to its course and resource pages. The site achieved top-three rankings for several competitive keywords, driving substantial increases in mock test registrations and course sign-ups. This solidified NEETGyanâ€™s position as a reliable digital destination for NEET aspirants.
